channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JCRVLT-446] AdvancedFilterValidatorTest.testFilterWithInvalidElements fails for non-english locale
item.description:
[ERROR] Failures:
[ERROR]   AdvancedFilterValidatorTest.testFilterWithInvalidElements:356
Expected: iterable containing [<ValidationMessage [severity=WARN, message=cvc-complex-type.3.2.2: Attribute 'mode' is not allowed to appear in element 'exclude'., line=20, column=51, ]>, <ValidationMessage [severity=WARN, message=cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element 'invalidelement'. One of '{exclude, include}' is expected., line=22, column=27, ]>, <ValidationMessage [severity=WARN, message=Invalid filter.xml, line=0, column=0, ]>]
     but: item 0: was <ValidationMessage [severity=WARN, message=cvc-complex-type.3.2.2: Attribut 'mode' darf nicht in Element 'exclude' vorkommen., line=20, column=51, ]>
[INFO]
[ERROR] Tests run: 64, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Seems that's a message generated by Java's XML Schema validator. Need to figure out how to use the english locale (or change the test not to rely on the language)

I will propose a PR soon.

Update: reschke Please check out https://github.com/apache/jackrabbit-filevault/pull/87/files.

Hm:

reschke Should be fixed now. Can you comment directly on the GH PR?
yes (with the latest change it seems to be back where it was -> language mismatch)
Fixed in https://github.com/apache/jackrabbit-filevault/commit/0fea61a725c7c204b86aee6aa7ff9b46bd2f9741 and also added a new CI build job for a non-English locale.
